posts.post_content:
$85 delivered for the lot. SOLD

Note- the Athletics Infield card has a couple of creases that don't show on the scan.  They run from the center top border diagonally to near the lower left corner of the center panel.  They do not extend to the M. Brown panel, but there is also a light crease on Brown's left ear.  I believe all other flaws show in the scans.
